channel.title: Error with going on servers
channel.description: When I type in a server ip, it says "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "Start server" to make your own." Help?

item.title: Error with going on servers
item.dc:creator: @newyorkowns newyorkowns
item.description:
@newyorkowns wrote:

it means the server is down, u put in the wrong port, u didnt use hamachi, your firewall is blocking it, or u dont have internet connection

i will explain each step couse i have no life

server is down:

many servers arent 24/7 so they will go down
or maybe the server crashed

wrong port:

many server use the port 43594

but some servers use a different port

to change it go to the moparscape client and click on “file”
then click new port and change the port.

you didnt use hamachi:

some server require hamachi
couse some ppl are too stupid to
get no-ip when in reality its very simple
(actually im just trying to act smart i have
no idea how to port foward i told
holli to do it for me rofl! so no offence ppl
dont flamm me) to get on hamachi you have to download it
u can download it at www.hamachi.cc
when u get on hamachi click on one of the
circle and one should say join network
type it the network (case sensitive)
and the pass then log in moparscape
like you always do and your done

your firewall is blocking it:

just go to your control panel
and click on security center
and turn your firewall off
easy huh?

you dont have internet connection:

uhh pretty self explanitory lol

uhh ok im pretty much done so if anyone wants to chill im free
uhh yeah…kinda bored…
just waiting for zarescape to get back up
#1 server 4 lyfe uhh…ok…anyone play rs2 huh?
yeah…ima go play now…76 wc ftw!
547 cw tickets…uhh almost 82 cooking…
erm…super bored…so yeah if your bored pm me
or something add me on msn or myspace…
uhh…yeah…bye… (i just noticed how much i wrote)

[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 11:22:05 PM[/size][hr]U BETTER BE READING THIS HOE!
